rule.name: DisallowMultipleStatements
rule.description: There must be only on statement per line.

rule.name: MultipleStatementAlignment
rule.description: If there are multiple adjacent assignments, the equals signs of each assignment have to be aligned.

property.name: error
property.description: If true, an error will be reported; otherwise a warning.

property.name: maxPadding
property.description: The maximum amount of padding before the alignment is ignored.

property.name: ignoreMultiLine
property.description: If true, multi-line assignments are not checked.

rule.name: NoSpaceAfterCast
rule.description: There may be no spaces after cast statements.

rule.name: SpaceAfterCast
rule.description: There must be a space after a cast statement.
